properties.scriptBody:
# Login using a Service Principal
az login --service-principal -u ${p:environment/service-principal-user} -p ${p:environment/service-principal-password} --tenant ${p:environment/tenant}

# This gets the credentials and caches them for a period of time so we can run kubectl commands
az aks get-credentials --resource-group test01 --name myAKSCluster

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
kubectl get nodes
kubectl get pods
